S1_1A:

we are going to become 
the best of friends!

know my name,

simply type your input  
in the box and press OK!

very own super-duper 
computer companion!
And I'll be your 
everlasting friend!
I can do many things 
such as play games, 
manage your system, 
adapt to you, 
and even read stories!

S2_START:
Welcome back friend!...
Huh, what was I doing 
last time I saw you?....

Oh That's right I was 
just about to tell 
you what I can do!..

In that case:
S2_STORY_0:
Kinito was home when a 
package came to the door.  

But who was it from 
and who was it for?
S2_STORY_1:
It was for Kinito as he
soon realised.

So he eagerly ripped it 
open to see what was inside!
S2_STORY_2:
"It's a computer!" 
Exclaimed Kinito with a 
grin bright and wide.

But the cables were tangled,  
so he started to untie.
S2_STORY_3:
And once Kinito was 
done he powered it on.

And watched it come to life 
with digital colour and song.
S2_STORY_4:
Kinito studied all he could learn

to make the online world upturn.
S2_STORY_5:
However, now Kinito 
had all these new tips  

and yet no friend to 
share his new tricks!
S2_STORY_6:
So he went on a quest and 
found a friend just like you  

To show you his skills 
and all he could do.
S2_STORY_7:
So why wait! 
The adventures lie ahead!

So together we can play games, 
search the web, and leave
no story unread!
S2_STORY_A:
New begginings. 

 A book by Kinito.
S2_STORY_A -n:
New begginings. 

 A book by Kinito.

just about to get started 
on some games!

To meet Jade, go to 
the [b]purple[/b] house!
S4_2A:
Jade the Jellyfish needs 
your help to fix her toys!  
Grab parts of 
of the conveyer 
belt to put the pieces  
back together.
This is going to 
be  s u p e r  fun!

This is my friend Jade!
Go on, introduce yourself.
S4_3B:
So, What do you have  
for us today?
S4_3C:
That sounds like fun!

to be getting some 
much-needed rest!
S4_4A:
Thank you for 
helping out Jade!

You did a really
good job!

press [b]next[/b]!
S4_5A:
Awesome! You 
have really helped
my friends out here!
I'll tell you what. 
As a treat for helping
me and my friends out
I'll give you a fun game!
S4_START:
Hmm what was I 
doing last time I

S5_START:
Hmm what was I 
doing last time I  
saw you?
Ah yes! You just finished
helping out Jade the Jellyfish
and as a reward we were 
going to play a game together!
In that case let
me load it back up!
S6_0A:
Well, Hello again!    
It seems that our 
last session was cut  
prematurely. 
But don't worry!
As I'm working better 
then ever now! 
Not that I wasn't  
working before!
Anyways!
What activity shall  
we do now....
S6_1A:
Ah yes! Thats it! 
One of my core features
is my adaptability!
And truth be told,  
I don't know 
you that well!  
So! I propose the  
one and only!

[wave]Best Friends Analysis Hub!
Where I will ask you 
questions in 6 diffrent
catagorys, so I can better   
adapt myself to you!
S6_1B:
Press the start button 
whenever you're ready!
S6_1C:
What's the wait for? 
Just press start so we   
can get going!
S6_S1-End:
And that concludes
the first section of the
best friends analysis hub!   
These questions are going  
to help me out a lot!
S6_S1-Q1:
Let's start with some easy
ones to get the ball rolling!   
Okay, Question 1.   

Is everything going
smoothly for you today?
S6_S1-Q1-conc:
To answer my question,
simply click on one of the  
options listed below!
S6_S1-Q1_No:
That's a shame! 
But don't worry, as I'll make
it my mission to change that!
S6_S1-Q1_Yes:
Amazing! Remember, 
you can always count on me    
to make everything run as
smooth as possible!
S6_S1-Q2:
Okay! Next question,    

Would you say you have 
enjoyed using KinitoPET?
S6_S1-Q2_No:
Well this will help
to solve that issue!  
As these questions will   
allow me to learn and
adapt making your 
experience better! 
So hopefully by the 
end of this all I would
have changed your mind!
S6_S1-Q2_Yes:
Yes! That's great to hear,   
and with these added 
questions I will learn
and adapt making your 
experience even better!
S6_S1-Q3:
Alright next question,

Who is your best friend?
S6_S1-Q3_Correct:
Thats right! I am 
your best friend, 
forever and allways!
S6_S1-Q3_Mistake:
HA!
perhaps you didn't     
[shake]hear[/shake] my question....

WHO                       

WHO IS                    

WHO IS YOUR               

WHO IS YOUR BEST          

WHO IS YOUR BEST FRIEND?
S6_S1-Q3_MistakeB:
WHO                       

WHO IS                    

WHO IS YOUR               

WHO IS YOUR BEST          

WHO IS YOUR BEST FRIEND?

Because we wouldn't want
you to miss hear again.        
would we.
S6_S1-Q4:
Question 4,

Do you have lots of free time?
S6_S1-Q4_No:
Oh okay, that's a shame. 
However, As your best friend 
I'll make sure to change that!
S6_S1-Q4_Yes:
It's good to have 
lots of free time!   
It just means you   
can spend more
time with me! 
Your best friend!

That webworld section

game sounds super fun! 
We should play it sometime!

S6_S3_Start:
Okay, for this next 
section I want to build  
an imaginary world.
Built just for you! 
I really want to know  
what your ideal 
conditions would be!
S6_S4_Q1:
To start, I have 
a question that I 
have been meaning   
to ask you..
S6_S4_Q1_0:
As you have been 
watching me I have 
grown curious to   
what you look like.
S6_S4_Q1_1:
and since we are   
friends and all I 
thought you 
wouldn't mind
So....   
 [shake]can i see your face?
S6_S4_REC_0:
why have you 
been recording me
S6_S4_REC_1:
I noticed that you 
always seemed to 
have an app open    
called-
-O.B.S and so I
was wondering 
why you would 
be recording me.
S6_S4_REC_2:
And since you 
have been 
looking at me..   
how about 
I look at
[shake]you[/shake] instead.    
That would   
be nice...
So...
[b][shake] CAN                 
[b][shake] CAN I               
[b][shake] CAN I SEE           
[b][shake] CAN I SEE YOUR      
[b][shake] CAN I SEE YOUR FACE

wraps up that    
little section!  
Moving on, I want 
to go a little off 
script, and ask some
of my own questions.
